The DNS records do not show any particular details that would indicate the website is outdated. Given the lack of scam-related information found in previous steps and the WHOIS data indicating a long-standing domain registration, I am inclined to conclude that there is no significant evidence to categorize ebodylogic.com as a scam website based on the information available.
